Text: Damien Broderick:  His science fiction novel "The Dreaming Dragons" (1980) introduced the trope of the generation time machine, his "The Judas Mandala" (1982) contains the first appearance of the term "virtual reality," and his 1997 popular science book The Spike was the first to investigate the technological Singularity in detail.
Triplets:<Damien Broderick
